mapper.select: select su.id id, su.nickname name, su.mobile phone, uue.ID_CARD idCard, su.status status, uue.STATUS registStatus, su.dept_id deptId, su.tenant_id tenantId from system_users su left join uctp_user_ext uue on uue.USER_ID = su.id where su.dept_id =#{deptId} and su.status in(0,1) and su.deleted=0
